DOC.brief_summary: This phase III trial compare early tracheotomy versus prolong endotracheal intubation intensive care unit patient need prolonged ventilatory support .
DOC.brief_title: Early Tracheotomy Versus Prolonged Endotracheal Intubation Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients ventilation support least 4 day Patients need ventilatory support > 7 day Age > 18 year Informed consent sign Patients previously tracheotomised Major hemorrhagic risk Patients previously randomise trial
DOC.keyword: ICU patient need prolonged ventilatory support
